resources.string: This activity will show a list of albums in the music library. Tapping an album will go to the Now Playing activity.
This activity will show a list of artists in the music library. Tapping an artist will go to the Now Playing activity.

In the main activity, a list of options is shown and each option can be tapped to go to that activity.\nMedia will be populated from the device using the ContentResolver Class (https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/ContentResolver.html)

The Now Playing activity will show detailed information about the item currently played, as well as controls to play, pause, etc.\nThe Android MediaPlayer Class (https://developer.android.com/reference/android/media/MediaPlayer.html) will be used to play songs.
This activity will show a list of playlists in the music library. Tapping a playlist will go to the Now Playing activity.
This activity will show a list of podcasts in the music library. Tapping a podcast will go to the Now Playing activity.
The search results will be shown in this activity. Tapping on a result will go to the Now Playing activity
This activity will show a pane with fields to enter criteria for album, artist, track name, etc. The results will be shown in the results activity.
